duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and update patient insurance and demographics prior to patient's appointment or upon arrival at the clinic.
Complete working items in assigned work queues in a timely manner.
Provide leadership for the Pre-Verification Specialists and oversee day-to-day operations.
Foster team work, team member engagement, and community involvement.
Ensure a safe patient environment driven by the principles of "First Do No Harm".

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, required.
2 years of medical and/or pre-verification experience, required.
Good working knowledge of Revenue Cycle, basic accounting, and medical terminology preferred.
Ability to work with individuals of all cultures and levels of authority.
